Text: RE possible prospectspst Hi Sally I am not sure if the new company with UBS needs people but I wanted to forward my resume to you just in case At Enron I worked in your Global Data Management group under Steve Venturatos and James Scribner ANY available positions in the trading support group would interest me including risk settlements data support scheduling etc If you should need any further information please contact me at or Thank you Yours truly Kelly Hermann Join the worlds largest email service with MSN Hotmail KHermanndoc
